alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 5:33PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sublette, south central Fremont and north central Sweetwater Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from southeast Sublette County to north-central Sweetwater County. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Big Sandy around 550 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oregon Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
